Package de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.annotation

  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IndexType
    Specifies a type of an index for an IndexField.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Entity
    The annotation defines a class to be a mappable instance and allows to give further information about the entity inside the used datastore ( database table, column in mongo or others ).
    EntityOption
    Defines an option for an entity, which is interpreted by teh implementation of IDataStore
    Index
    Describes an index, which shall be defined in the datastore
    Indexes
    A list of defined Index for the current mapper
    IndexField
    Defines one field of the index
    IndexOptions
    Describes the options of an Index
    KeyGenerator
    By using this annotation the IKeyGenerator can be set for a certain IMapper.
    ObjectFactory
    Each mapper can define its own IObjectFactory
